entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries near noon. Becoming clear late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 10 except minus 3 along parts of the coast.
